name: N88 Spaceshooter
description:
Note: This "game" is open source under MIT license on github https://github.com/2540825244/N88-SpaceShooter

To run this game copy the script in basic.txt to your NEC PC 8800 series computer or emulator, this game was made in NEC PC 8801MA emulator (because I was trying to reference to TONIKAWA)

It should work on all 8800 series though (remember to switch to V2)

Or you can try to run it with a desktop runtime enviroment, I cannot get myself hands on those so I haven't tried it yet.

The game is simple. Firstly, you start by pressing W. Then you move your spaceship left and right by pressing A or D, and shoot by W. Your goal is to shoot all enemy before they kill you or reach your base.

Be patient though as I am not experienced at developing under hardware constraint the game does not run particularly efficient, so expect seconds per frame.

If you are on an emulator it is recommended to speeds thing up.

If you do multiple commands in a single frame the commands will stack up and execute one by one, this may to due to how input system work in N88-Basic but keep that in mind.
